---
#title: "Academic Research"
---

My academic interests revolve around the development of efficient sampling algorithms for problems characterized by high-dimensional missing data. I have focused on stochastic epidemic models and breast cancer models for which I have developed Metropolis-Hastings samplers that efficiently explore the high-dimensional latent space. Before my Ph.D., I developed a content-based course recommender system for students of a Liberal Arts college and employed conformal prediction for course grade prediction.
